body_html:
That workaround (using --distinct_host_configuration=false as part of the bazel build flags) is working for me in non-GPU build tests.
Of course, I don't like workarounds, but it will get me through until a conclusive solve is worked out.
Thanks @annarev . I am happy to run any other tests needed / provide data to help debug further.

body:
That workaround (using --distinct_host_configuration=false as part of the bazel build flags) is working for me in non-GPU build tests.
Of course, I don't like workarounds, but it will get me through until a conclusive solve is worked out.
Thanks @annarev . I am happy to run any other tests needed / provide data to help debug further.
